Text:
This gets stuck at 99.94% because a block is missing because some filenames were too long or contained unicode characters (at least that's my best guess as to why).

All of the data is still there, it's only missing a few of the non-important images and some html files that are just a 404 page. Everything else is fine.

I'll make sure I upload a proper one once all of the cables have been released.

So, Sorry for the inconvenience, just consider 99.94% to mean 100%.
